Is it just me, or are all these parts massively oversized? I tried putting a manipulator arm on a rover to move spent stages around and de-clutter my Munolith base, but to my dismay I found out even a fully closed claw doesn\'t grasp a 1m tank completely (mind you, I found that out after I put the damn thing on the Mun). If I so much as touch the steering controls, the damn thing slides right out again. IMO pretty much all of these should be about half the size they are now.

Been trying to make a set of smaller parts, but unity simply can\'t handle that small colliders. And the lack of small colliders means that I can\'t make a claw, but we are working on an alternative to the claw that will work down to much smaller size.

It might be possible to make a 75% size set, but I\'ve been too busy doing other things to do the required testing.
